mapper.sql: ID, SUPPLIER_ID, ORG_NAME, TOTAL_PERSON, TOTAL_MANAGE, TOTAL_TECH, TOTAL_WORKER, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT
mapper.insert:
insert into T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_MAT_SERVE
ID,
SUPPLIER_ID,
ORG_NAME,
TOTAL_PERSON,
TOTAL_MANAGE,
TOTAL_TECH,
TOTAL_WORKER,
CREATED_AT,
UPDATED_AT,
#{id},
#{supplierId},
#{orgName},
#{totalPerson},
#{totalMange},
#{totalTech},
#{totalWorker},
#{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_MAT_SERVE
SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId},
ORG_NAME = #{orgName},
TOTAL_PERSON = #{totalPerson},
TOTAL_MANAGE = #{totalMange},
TOTAL_TECH = #{totalTech},
TOTAL_WORKER = #{totalWorker},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id}

update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_MAT_SERVE set SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_NAME = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL_PERSON = #{totalPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TOTAL_MANAGE = #{totalMange,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TOTAL_TECH = #{totalTech,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TOTAL_WORKER = #{totalWorker,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: select ID from T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_MAT_SERVE where SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId}
SELECT SUPPLIER_ID FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_CERT_SERVE t1 LEFT JOIN T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_MAT_SERVE t2 ON t1.MAT_SERVE_ID = t2.ID WHERE t1.ID = #{id}
